meanings.definition: The property of having a pleasant, distinctive smell.
meanings.sent1: The aromaticity of the flowers filled the room with a lovely scent.
meanings.sent2: I love the aromaticity of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The aromaticity of the perfume was so strong that it made everyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The aromaticity of the coffee wafted through the air, awakening my senses.
meanings.sent5: The aromaticity of the pine forest was like a natural air freshener.

meanings.definition: The quality of being fragrant or aromatic.
meanings.sent1: The aromaticity of the spices in the dish made it irresistible.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the aromaticity of the flowers in her garden.
meanings.sent3: The aromaticity of the candles turned the room into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent4: The aromaticity of the herbs in the soup added depth to the flavor.
meanings.sent5: The aromaticity of the bakery drew customers in from the street.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being aromatic.
meanings.sent1: The aromaticity of the essential oils brought a sense of calm.
meanings.sent2: The aromaticity of the tea leaves infused the water with flavor.
meanings.sent3: The aromaticity of the soap made washing hands a delightful experience.
meanings.sent4: The aromaticity of the incense created a peaceful atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The aromaticity of the garden herbs made cooking a joy.
